translations.text: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺.<sup foot_note=77591>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: As for the one who was indifferent,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: From what substance did He create them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then He makes the way easy for them,<sup foot_note=77592>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: and provides a grave for him

translations.text: then causes them to die and be buried.<sup foot_note=77593>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Let people then consider their food:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: how We pour down rain in abundance
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: causing grain to grow in it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: as well as grapes and greens,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then, when the Deafening Blast<sup foot_note=77594>1</sup> comes to pass—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ

translations.text: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
